title: Galactic Civilization 2 Twilight of Arnor the FULL VER
description:
thankx to stardock

Included in this rar file are Galactic civ2 dreadlords+Dark Avatar ver1.80g and 

Twilight of the Arnor 1.95, i have tested this and it works on my other windows xp sp3 
pc even without proper installation of galactic civ 2 original and dark avatar expansion.
This does not have a proper installation method


1. Extract this to C:\\Program Files\\Stardock
  

2. import \"registrypatch.reg\" to the registry
3. C:\\Program Files\\Stardock\\TotalGaming\\GalCiv2\\Twilight\\Base
    and run the program \"GC2TwilightOfTheArnor.exe\" to play the game

If you wish to install on another drive or installation directory, 
be sure to change the \"registrypatch.reg\"


Thanks to illunatic for seeding original patch
Thanks to Ajajaja for registry and hex patch

I just compiled this because no scene group has yet release this awesome game 
(as far as I know)

(Only temporary solution)


Congrats to 
Manny Pacquiao - Saludo kita..

spy
Philippines
